siteMetadata.title: Joshua Martínez
siteMetadata.description: Portfolio website for Diego Joshua Martínez Pineda. Software Developer based in Copenhagen. Student of Msc. in Computer Science at ITU. Experienced in JS, React, Vue.js, Node.js, Express, PHP, Symfony, Laravel. With knowledge of Python, Java, C.
siteMetadata.author: Diego Joshua Martínez Pineda
